highlights: Development and implementation of custom on-demand systems, focusing on automation and business process optimization.
Created a Point of Sale (POS) integrated with WooCommerce that optimized inventory and sales control for small stores, using Laravel as the backend framework.
Architecture and structuring of web applications, applying software architecture patterns to ensure scalability and security.
Development of websites, e-commerce platforms, and landing pages using WordPress.
Technical support and consulting for companies and entrepreneurs.
Technical support for users across different sectors, including customer service and troubleshooting.
Troubleshooting hardware and software issues with a focus on agility and efficiency.
Preventive and corrective maintenance of equipment and systems.
Assistance in configuring and supporting the city's internal systems.
Configuration and monitoring of servers with Zabbix.
Development of web systems using Laravel and WordPress.
